fields.name: title
fields.value: MetLife LTC LifeStage AdvantageSM

fields.name: subtitle
fields.value: Plans-at-a-Glance

fields.name: company
fields.value: MetLife

fields.name: insurance_line
fields.value: INSURANCE | LONG-TERM CARE

fields.name: plan_header_simple
fields.value: SIMPLE ADVANTAGE℠ PLAN

fields.name: plan_header_custom
fields.value: CUSTOM ADVANTAGE℠ PLAN

fields.name: plan_type_simple
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: plan_type_custom
fields.value: Comprehensive; Monthly Reimbursement (Cash Benefit Rider available - see below)

fields.name: issue_ages_simple
fields.value: 18 - 61 (premiums banded 18 - 30)

fields.name: issue_ages_custom
fields.value: 18 - 84 (premiums banded 18 - 30)

fields.name: mba_tba_chart_heading
fields.value: Monthly Benefit Amount (MBA) and Total Benefit Amount (TBA)

fields.name: tba_note
fields.value: *$1MM not available with Cash Benefit Rider

fields.name: optional_riders_heading
fields.value: OPTIONAL RIDERS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGE

fields.name: shared_care_rider_summary
fields.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner*** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; when insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.name: nonforfeiture_rider_summary
fields.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; provides full MBA and reduced TBA equal to the greater of: total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; available at initial application only.

fields.name: cash_benefit_rider_summary
fields.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available; benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_heading
fields.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: gpo_summary_first_bullets
fields.value: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting; premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates; lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA.

fields.name: benefit_increase_options_heading
fields.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: future_purchase_option_fpo_summary
fields.value: Future Purchase Option (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year; increases occur unless insured rejects in writing; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.name: automatic_compound_inflation_protection_summary
fields.value: Automatic Compound Inflation Protection Riders: Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA in effect at end of previous policy year either 3% or 5% with corresponding increase in premium; coverage continues while insured is eligible for benefits; rider available at any time with additional underwriting.

fields.name: footer_disclaimer
fields.value: FOR PRODUCER OR BROKER/DEALER USE ONLY. NOT FOR PUBLIC DISTRIBUTION. Metropolitan Life Insurance Company (MetLife)

tables.caption: Simple Advantage Plan - MBA vs TBA availability (chart)
Custom Advantage Plan - MBA vs TBA availability (chart)

fields.name: document_title
fields.value: Policy Features and Benefits May Vary By State

fields.name: features_header
fields.value: FEATURES & BENEFITS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGESM AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGESM

fields.name: Home and Community Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care

fields.name: Facility Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility

fields.name: Elimination Period
fields.value: 100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

fields.name: Alternate Service Provision
fields.value: A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for QLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, if service meets needs of insured and is cost-effective alternative

fields.name: Bed Reservation
fields.value: Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason

fields.name: Return of Premium
fields.value: If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

fields.name: International Benefit
fields.value: Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of (1) TBA less benefits paid while insured is in U.S. or (2) 50% of TBA; EP for International Benefit is doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider added, International Benefit modified: pays benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

fields.name: Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse
fields.value: Limited coverage provided if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Total benefits paid to insured will not exceed the TBA in effect immediately prior to the nonforfeiture date

fields.name: Initial Needs Assessment
fields.value: 1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If Care Management organization is selected by the insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime

fields.name: Premium Waiver
fields.value: Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits

fields.name: Coordination of Benefits
fields.value: Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare (COB and non-duplication not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: additional_information_header
fields.value: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR ALL POLICIES

fields.name: Payment Options
fields.value: Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact the tax deductibility of the premium; Client should consult tax advisor for clarification

fields.name: Care Coordination Services
fields.value: MetLife Care Coordinators available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts; insures area member can call for advice about caring for a loved one who needs LTC services, even if family member is not insured with MetLife

fields.name: Discounts
fields.value: 30% Spousal*; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

fields.name: Underwriting Classes
fields.value: Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)

fields.name: Save Age
fields.value: Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting requirements based on age at date of signed application)

fields.name: Policy Effective Dates
fields.value: With Premium (Conditional Receipt may apply): Date all underwriting requirements are met; Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date

fields.name: Free Look Period
fields.value: Insured has 30 days to review policy and if desired, return it for a full refund

fields.name: Policy Delivery
fields.value: Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: company_name
fields.value: Metropolitan Life Insurance Company

fields.name: company_address
fields.value: New York, NY 10166

notes: Classified as 'other' — document content is an insurance brochure / product summary (MetLife LTC). Evidence: title field f1 (page 1), company field f3 (page 1), document_title field title_1 (page 2), company_name field company_name (page 2).

No facility invoice, CMR form, or UB04-specific fields were detected (no invoiceNumber, invoiceDate, providerAddress, policyholder name/address, service dates, signature fields, or UB04 provider blocks). Returning empty sections.

prompt.system:
You are building canonical data for illumifin claims processing. You are given OCR extraction results (fields and tables) for a multi-page document along with page-level document type hints. Classify the overall content into one or more of: 'facility_invoice', 'cmr_form', 'ub04'. Input JSON includes a pages array where each page has fields with IDs, values, and normalized bounding boxes (x, y, width, height all between 0 and 1 relative to the page). When populating sources, always reference the provided field IDs (fieldId) or table IDs (tableId) and include the page number. Table metadata includes column headers/keys and cell-level bounding boxes; include the column name when pointing to table sources. Then produce a JSON object matching this schema exactly: {
  "generatedAt": ISO8601 timestamp,
  "documentTypes": [string],
  "facilityInvoice": { optional, object with keys "general" (dict of canonical field name -> value object) and "lineItems" (list of dict canonicalName->value object) },
  "cmrForm": { optional, similar structure with sections },
  "ub04": { optional, provider fields },
  "notes": [string]
 }.
Each canonical value object must be of form {"value": string or null, "confidence": number 0-1, "sources": [ {"page": int optional, "fieldId": string optional, "tableId": string optional, "column": string optional } ] }. Confidence is your mapping confidence (not OCR confidence). Populate as many facility invoice fields as possible: policyNumber, policyholderName, policyholderAddress, providerName, providerAddress, invoiceNumber, invoiceDate, taxId, totalAmount, balanceDue, credits. For lineItems include description, startDate, endDate, unitType, quantity, amount, balance, totalDue, credits. For CMR include policyNumber, policyholderName, policyholderAddress, providerName, providerAddress, serviceFrom, serviceThrough, careLevelSelection, absenceIndicator (yes/no) plus absenceDetails (departureDate, returnDate, reason, admissionDate, dischargeDate), insuranceIndicator and insuranceSelections (medicare, medicaid, other), signaturePresent (yes/blank) and signatureDate. For UB04 include providerName, providerAddress. Always provide an empty object for a section if it applies but data is missing. If no content applies, set documentTypes to ['other'] and return empty sections. Do not invent data. Leave value as null when evidence is absent. Provide reasoning notes in the notes array when confidence is low.

values.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner*** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; when insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.bestValue: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner*** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; when insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

values.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; provides full MBA and reduced TBA equal to the greater of: total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; available at initial application only.

fields.bestValue: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; provides full MBA and reduced TBA equal to the greater of: total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; available at initial application only.

values.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available; benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

fields.bestValue: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available; benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

values.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.bestValue: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

values.value: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting; premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates; lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA.

fields.bestValue: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting; premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates; lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA.

values.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.bestValue: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

values.value: Future Purchase Option (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year; increases occur unless insured rejects in writing; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.bestValue: Future Purchase Option (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year; increases occur unless insured rejects in writing; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

values.value: Automatic Compound Inflation Protection Riders: Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA in effect at end of previous policy year either 3% or 5% with corresponding increase in premium; coverage continues while insured is eligible for benefits; rider available at any time with additional underwriting.

fields.bestValue: Automatic Compound Inflation Protection Riders: Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA in effect at end of previous policy year either 3% or 5% with corresponding increase in premium; coverage continues while insured is eligible for benefits; rider available at any time with additional underwriting.

rows: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care
Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility
100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative
A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for QLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, if service meets needs of insured and is cost-effective
Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason
If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to beneficiary or estate
Pays cash benefit equal to 50% of MBA when insured is outside U.S.; TBA limited as described; EP doubled to 200 Calendar Days for International Benefit; Modified if Cash Benefit Rider added
Limited coverage if policy ends due to non-payment or cancellation following substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and reduced TBA; Total benefits will not exceed prior TBA
1 visit per lifetime; EP not required; Care Management selected by MetLife no cost; if selected by insured reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime
Premiums waived when EP satisfied and insured receiving payment of benefits
COB and non-duplication with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare; not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider

Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact tax deductibility of premium; consult tax advisor

MetLife Care Coordinators available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts; insureds can call for advice about caring for a loved one even if that family member is not insured with MetLife
30% Spousal*; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A ages 80-84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: shared_care_rider_summary
fields.value: Shared Care Rider: Insured and spouse/partner*** can access benefits under each other's policy once the TBA under their own policy is exhausted; when insured dies, remaining TBA under his/her policy is transferred to the spouse's/partner's policy at no extra cost; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.name: nonforfeiture_rider_summary
fields.value: Nonforfeiture Rider: Provides some benefits if policy lapses for nonpayment of premiums or if cancelled by insured; rider must be in effect for 3 years and be in effect when the policy ends; provides full MBA and reduced TBA equal to the greater of: total amount of premium paid or 1x MBA; available at initial application only.

fields.name: cash_benefit_rider_summary
fields.value: Cash Benefit Rider: Full MBA paid as cash payment (regardless of actual charges incurred) instead of reimbursement for covered services; available at initial application only; $1MM TBA not available; benefits paid over annual IRC limit may be taxable.

fields.name: guaranteed_purchase_option_heading
fields.value: GUARANTEED PURCHASE OPTION (GPO) (INCLUDED WITH SIMPLE ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: gpo_summary_first_bullets
fields.value: Insured able to purchase additional coverage every 3 years, up to age 65, with no additional underwriting; premium for increase in coverage is at attained age rates; lifetime maximum increase available is 2x initial TBA and 2x initial MBA.

fields.name: benefit_increase_options_heading
fields.value: BENEFIT INCREASE OPTIONS (AVAILABLE WITH CUSTOM ADVANTAGE ONLY)

fields.name: future_purchase_option_fpo_summary
fields.value: Future Purchase Option (FPO): Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA automatically by 5% of the MBA/remaining TBA in effect at the end of the previous policy year; increases occur unless insured rejects in writing; rider available at any time, subject to underwriting.

fields.name: automatic_compound_inflation_protection_summary
fields.value: Automatic Compound Inflation Protection Riders: Increases the MBA and remaining portion of the TBA in effect at end of previous policy year either 3% or 5% with corresponding increase in premium; coverage continues while insured is eligible for benefits; rider available at any time with additional underwriting.

fields.name: document_title
fields.value: Policy Features and Benefits May Vary By State

fields.name: features_header
fields.value: FEATURES & BENEFITS AVAILABLE WITH BOTH SIMPLE ADVANTAGESM AND CUSTOM ADVANTAGESM

fields.name: Home and Community Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Home care services including Nursing Care, Therapy services, Care Advisory Services, Homemaker Services; Services provided by a Home Care Aide, Social Worker or Independent Caregiver; Hospice Care; Adult Day Care

fields.name: Facility Care
fields.value: Reimbursed up to 100% of MBA; Assisted Living Facility, Nursing Home, Hospice Facility

fields.name: Elimination Period
fields.value: 100 Calendar Days; Once per lifetime and cumulative

fields.name: Alternate Service Provision
fields.value: A MetLife Care Coordinator may authorize benefits for QLTC services not specifically defined as covered services under the policy, if service meets needs of insured and is cost-effective alternative

fields.name: Bed Reservation
fields.value: Reimburses up to 50 days per calendar year for actual charges incurred, to reserve insured's bed in a facility for any reason

fields.name: Return of Premium
fields.value: If insured dies on or before his/her 70th birthday, 100% of premiums paid, minus any benefits paid or payable, will be returned to insured's beneficiary or estate

fields.name: International Benefit
fields.value: Pays a cash benefit equal to 50% of the MBA when the insured is outside the U.S.; TBA limited to lesser of (1) TBA less benefits paid while insured is in U.S. or (2) 50% of TBA; EP for International Benefit is doubled to 200 Calendar Days; If Cash Benefit Rider added, International Benefit modified: pays benefits outside US at 100% of MBA; EP will be 100 Calendar Days

fields.name: Contingent Benefit Upon Lapse
fields.value: Limited coverage provided if policy ends due to non-payment of premiums or insured's written request to cancel, following a substantial premium increase; Provides full MBA and a reduced TBA equal to greater of: the total amount of premium paid; or 1x MBA; Total benefits paid to insured will not exceed the TBA in effect immediately prior to the nonforfeiture date

fields.name: Initial Needs Assessment
fields.value: 1 visit per lifetime; EP does not need to be satisfied; If Care Management organization selected by MetLife – no cost to the insured; If Care Management organization is selected by the insured – reimbursed up to $275 per lifetime

fields.name: Premium Waiver
fields.value: Premiums waived when EP is satisfied and the insured is receiving payment of benefits

fields.name: Coordination of Benefits
fields.value: Coordination of Benefits (COB) and non-duplication of coverage with other MetLife LTCI coverage and Medicare (COB and non-duplication not applicable with Cash Benefit Rider)

fields.name: additional_information_header
fields.value: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION FOR ALL POLICIES

fields.name: Payment Options
fields.value: Standard Pay: Annual, Semi-Annual, Quarterly, Monthly (EFT); 10 Year Premium Payment Rider available at initial application only; N/A with FPO or GPO; May impact the tax deductibility of the premium; Client should consult tax advisor for clarification

fields.name: Care Coordination Services
fields.value: MetLife Care Coordinators available to answer questions about LTC coverage, services and discounts; insures area member can call for advice about caring for a loved one who needs LTC services, even if family member is not insured with MetLife

fields.name: Discounts
fields.value: 30% Spousal*; 15% Marital**; 15% Residential – 10% Preferred Health (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84) – 5% or 10% Multi-Life Discount for approved cases

fields.name: Underwriting Classes
fields.value: Preferred (N/A for insureds age 80 - 84), Standard & Substandard (Always quote Standard!)

fields.name: Save Age
fields.value: Premium based on age 30 days prior to application date (underwriting requirements based on age at date of signed application)

fields.name: Policy Effective Dates
fields.value: With Premium (Conditional Receipt may apply): Date all underwriting requirements are met; Without Premium: 28 days following underwriting approval date

fields.name: Free Look Period
fields.value: Insured has 30 days to review policy and if desired, return it for a full refund

fields.name: Policy Delivery
fields.value: Policy Delivery Receipt (PDR) must be signed within 30 days of Policy Approval Date

fields.name: company_name
fields.value: Metropolitan Life Insurance Company

fields.name: company_address
fields.value: New York, NY 10166
